translations: adj.不友好的；不利的（unfriendly 的变形）

sentences.sentence: With its unhelpful locals and general aloofness, Moscow has been dubbed the unfriendliest city in the world.
sentences.translation: 莫斯科由于不乐于助人的居民和整体的冷漠氛围，获得了世界上最不友好城市的称号。

sentences.sentence: More than 46,000 readers gave their opinions last year on everything from favorite airlines to best hotels and friendliest and unfriendliest cities.
sentences.translation: 过去一年中4.6万读者给出了对于航空公司、酒店、城市的看法，选出最友好和最不友好城市。

sentences.sentence: In the US, Atlantic city in New Jersey was ranked the second unfriendliest city with one visitor commenting: "it's fun - if you like to gamble and don't mind rude, fast-paced people."
sentences.translation: 美国新泽西州的大西洋城在最不友好城市中排名第二，有一位游客评论称：“去大西洋城旅游很有趣—如果你喜欢赌博而且不介意粗鲁无礼和走得很快的人们的话。”
